name: FUNtastic Nice!
description:
You would like to visit Nice, the capital of the Côte
d’Azur, but you’re tired of the traditional guides? You find difficult to
choose what to do, where to eat? Let me be your guide for this 3 hours tour,
when you can meet the real city, not by running around all the museums and statues, but by wandering in the streets, discovering the local specialties and
making long-lasting memories.
